pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Fertility Projection // Making probabilistic projections of total fertility rate for all countries of the world, using a Bayesian hierarchical model doi:10.1007/s13524-011-0040-5 doi:10.18637/jss.v106.i08. Subnational probabilistic projections are also supported doi:10.4054/DemRes.2018.38.60.
